segments.text: Can you imagine a boat letting in the river ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure thing . I have an experience like that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , how were you saved finally ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was in such a panic at that time . Fortunately another boat came along and I was saved from drowning .
segments.speaker: S1
